name: BBC News Text only version Inverted [Dark]
description:
Implemented a dark line pattern as a background -- for best results; use in conjuction with the Nasa Launch Theme (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addons/policy/0/4908/49748)

UPDATE 5/14/09 - Paragraph width is added for easier reading...

UPDATE 6/11/09 - Changed http://news.bbc.co.uk/text_only.stm to correspond with the http://news.bbc.co.uk/low URI update.
